TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISuiteBuilder

Docs.summary: The ISuiteBuilder interface is exposed by a class that knows how to build a suite from one or more Types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class NUnit.Framework.Internal.Test BuildFrom(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the fixture to be used
Docs.summary: Build a TestSuite from type provided.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanBuildFrom(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the fixture to be used
Docs.summary: Examine the type and determine if it is suitable for this builder to use in building a TestSuite. Note that returning false will cause the type to be ignored in loading the tests. If it is desired to load the suite but label it as non-runnable, ignored, etc., then this method must return true.
Docs.returns: True if the type can be used to build a TestSuite
